summary: Translate full-length books and documents with Ollama, OpenAI (comptabible), Gemini, Mistral, Poe or OpenRouter. Preserves formatting. Resumes where you left off. No file size limits.

summary: A production-grade agentic chatbot server built in Rust with multi-provider LLM support, tool calling, RAG, MCP integration, and advanced research capabilities

title: langchain4j/langchain4j
summary: LangChain4j is an open-source Java library that simplifies the integration of LLMs into Java applications through a unified API, providing access to popular LLMs and vector databases. It makes implementing RAG, tool calling (including support for MCP), and agents easy. LangChain4j integrates seamlessly with various enterprise Java frameworks.

summary: 🌐 The open-source Agentic browser; alternative to ChatGPT Atlas, Perplexity Comet, Dia.

summary: 🤖 Streamline bookings and payments with our AI-powered chatbot, designed for customers and teams using advanced multi-agent architecture.

title: lulleboi/cc-copilot-bridge

title: infiniflow/ragflow
summary: RAGFlow is a leading open-source Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) engine that fuses cutting-edge RAG with Agent capabilities to create a superior context layer for LLMs

title: Yandatini/mcp-agent-framework
summary: 🤖 Orchestrate AI agents at scale using the MCP framework, enabling seamless context sharing, communication, and integration for enhanced collaboration.

title: bill86854238/PetPhotoSorter
summary: PetPhotoSorter 是一款專為寵物主人設計的智慧照片整理工具。結合 YOLO 物件偵測與 CLIP   模型，自動區分家中狗狗（二季與四季）並依照動作、年齡與毛色進行分類。最新版本整合了 Ollama (Local   AI)，能在本地端使用強大的視覺模型（如   Qwen2.5-VL）為每一張照片生成繁體中文的情境描述，完全保障隱私且無須雲端費用。支援 NAS   網路磁碟、跨平台（Mac/Win）自動切換路徑，並具備智慧快取功能，大幅提升透過 VPN/Tailscale   整理大量照片時的效率。

title: tienlt2406/browser-pilot
summary: 🧭 Enhance your browsing with Browser Pilot, an AI assistant that understands web content and automates complex tasks for a smarter online experience.

title: tkboys123/whatsapp-bridge-mcp
summary: 🤖 Streamline your support by turning your personal WhatsApp into an AI-powered channel with this cost-effective, open-source bridge server.
